citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A report was not submitted to the Institutional Official regarding the semiannual program and facility evaluations
conducted in June of 2023. In order to ensure information regarding facility adherence to the Animal Welfare Act is
conveyed to the Institutional Official, the IACUC shall prepare reports of the semiannual program and facility evaluations
according to the requirements in this subsection. These reports must be submitted to the Institutional Official and updated
at least once every six months upon completion of the required evaluations. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by
a majority of the IACUC members, contain any minority views, and contain a description of the nature and extent of the
facility’s adherence to the requirements in the Animal Welfare Act.
To be corrected from May 13, 2024 forward by updating the report to the Institutional Official at least once every 6 months
with the committee's semi-annual evaluation findings.

The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2023, due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 2023, was
submitted on December 7th, 2023. Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally
acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Per this
section of the regulations, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, covering the use of live animals in the
previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Quality Assurance Manager.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
A report was not submitted to the Institutional Official regarding the semiannual program and facility evaluations 
conducted in June of 2023. In order to ensure information regarding facility adherence to the Animal Welfare Act is 
conveyed to the Institutional Official, the IACUC shall prepare reports of the semiannual program and facility evaluations 
according to the requirements in this subsection. These reports must be submitted to the Institutional Official and updated 
at least once every six months upon completion of the required evaluations. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by 
a majority of the IACUC members, contain any minority views, and contain a description of the nature and extent of the 
facility’s adherence to the requirements in the Animal Welfare Act. 
To be corrected from May 13, 2024 forward by updating the report to the Institutional Official at least once every 6 months 
with the committee's semi-annual evaluation findings. 
2.36(a)  Repeat
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2023, due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 2023, was 
submitted on December 7th, 2023. Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally 
acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Per this 
section of the regulations, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, covering the use of live animals in the 
previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Quality Assurance Manager.
